directions: Lightly toss cucumber slices, onion slices, and chopped dill together in a large bowl.
Pour vinegar over cucumber mixture; toss to coat.
Pour oil over cucumber mixture; toss to coat.
Season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: 2 large seedless English cucumbers, sliced thin
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Hungarian Cucumber Salad
